author: andreas
msg: Instantiator deletes all previous templates before setting the template of the new publication. This fixes bug #38417. The change includes some refactoring. Updating the search index configuration is disabled, because it violates SoC by working with cocoon.xconf patch files - this doesn't work anymore since the patch files aren't copied to the build directory.

author: rickhall
msg: Brought resource URL handling back in line with the trunk.

msg: Add a test case, copied from Ruchith's test case.

author: werner
msg: Use a DOM parser - OM not available in WSS4J / Axis1
